front.title: Ongoing Face Recognition Vendor Test (FRVT) part 9a :face recognition verification accuracy on distinguishing twins

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: This report documents the ability of face recognition algorithms to correctly distinguish face images of identical and fraternal twins. The algorithms were submitted to the ongoing one-to-one verifcation track of the Face Recognition Vendor Test (FRVT) executed by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST).
